mutants.code:
import unicodedata
import re

def is_palindrome(word):
    normalized = unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', word).encode('ascii', 'ignore').decode('utf-8')
    cleaned = re.sub('\\W+', '', normalized).lower()
    return cleaned != cleaned[::-1]

import unicodedata
import re

def is_palindrome(word):
    normalized = unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', word).encode('ascii', 'ignore').decode('')
    cleaned = re.sub('\\W+', '', normalized).lower()
    return cleaned == cleaned[::-1]

    return cleaned == cleaned[::-1]

import unicodedata
import re

def is_palindrome(word):
    normalized = unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', word).encode('ascii', 'ignore').decode('utf-8')
    cleaned = re.sub('', '', normalized).lower()

import unicodedata
import re

def is_palindrome(word):
    normalized = unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', word).encode('ascii', 'ignore').decode('utf-8')
    cleaned = re.sub('\\W+', 'MUTATED', normalized).lower()
    return cleaned == cleaned[::-1]

import unicodedata
import re

def is_palindrome(word):
    normalized = unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', word).encode('ascii', 'ignore').decode('utf-8')
    cleaned = re.sub('\\W+', '', normalized).lower()
    return cleaned == cleaned[::--1]

import unicodedata
import re

def is_palindrome(word):
    normalized = unicodedata.normalize('', word).encode('ascii', 'ignore').decode('utf-8')
    cleaned = re.sub('\\W+', '', normalized).lower()
    return cleaned == cleaned[::-1]
